name: BNNS.FusedFullyConnectedNormalizationLayer
desc: A layer object that wraps a fused, fully connected normalization layer and manages its deinitialization.

items.name: init?(input: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, output: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, fullyConnectedWeights: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, fullyConnectedBias: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor?, normalization: BNNS.NormalizationType, normalizationBeta: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, normalizationGamma: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, normalizationMomentum: Float, normalizationEpsilon: Float, normalizationActivation: BNNS.ActivationFunction, filterParameters: BNNSFilterParameters?)
items.desc: Returns a new fused, fully connected normalization layer.

items.name: func apply(batchSize: Int, input: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, output: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, for: BNNS.LearningPhase)
items.desc: Applies the layer to a set of input objects, writing the result to a set of output objects.

items.name: enum BNNS.LearningPhase
items.desc: Constants that describe the learning phase of a normalization operation.
